attributes.action: stop uk councils bringing in local  congestion charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its coming to manchester and smaller towns around. Other councils in the uk are considering using the same idea to increase revenue,if the Manchester  congestion charge is succesful. The time to stop this is now by signing this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
